title: Testrail Report Template
description: Describes how to submit a testrail report.

package.description: The package string to import the reporter from. Optional, for using custom reporter.

class_name.description: The name of the reporter class to use. Optional, for using custom reporters.

project_id.description: The TestRail project id to push reports to.

conn.description: Settings to estabish a connection through the Testrail api.

user.description: The username for testrail credentials. If not provided user will be prompted. If value is '~' OS credentials will  be used.

password.description: The password for testrail credentials. Provided as an option, but not recommended for general use due to password safety.

host.description: Address for the server of the user credentials. Used when connecting to the api.

ssl-verify.description: Sets the ssl verification mode. 1=(default)Standard verification, 2=(WIP)Use provided certificate to verify, 3=No verify

url-base.description: The base url to access the testrail api.

always-close-runs.description: Setting that determines whether all test runs are closed immediately.

close-successful-runs.description: Setting that determines whether successful test runs are closed.

test-case.description: Mappings for a TASS case to convert to a  Testrail case

tuuid.description: TASS uuid of the specific case.

id.description: The case ID of the case in Testrail.

test-run.description: Mappings and description to prepare a TestRail run.

cases.description: Cases should be either 'true' if all cases should be included, or an array containing a list of cases to include using the TASS uuid. Default is to include all cases.

name.description: The name for the run created in Testrail. Defaults to the name of the Tass Execution file.

description.description: Description for the Testrail run. Defaults to use TASS details.

suite_id.description: The suite ID of the Testrail case if applicable

test-plan.description: Mappings and description to prepare a TestRail plan.

name.description: The name for the plan created in Testrail. Defaults to the name of the Tass Execution file.

description.description: Description for the Testrail plan. Defaults to use TASS details.

entries.description: List of runs as decribed above to include in the plan.
